name: Ramen Heaven
description:
Slurp up the fun in the quirky PSP® soup game Ramen Heaven. Use your chopsticks to collect bubbles of oil floating on the soup, and place them in your spoon to eat up, increasing your satisfaction gauge. A bowl of ramen has never had so many obstacles in it, knock into an egg and your oil bubble will split up, braise a naruto, and it may pop altogether. Heat up the fun by grabbing a friend and competing head to head!

Download Ramen Heaven today!

Recommended for one or two players and playable using a single PSP® system.



"PSP" is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and this item's use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all of these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
